articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Houses for Educators of Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Houses for Educators of Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the construction site of apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University near completion.
					 44 storied and 36 storied apartment houses for educators based on wonderful formative art have a laundry, a public bath and various other public service facilities and a small park.
					
					 There are peculiarly built indoor resting places on the 17th and 30th floors of the 44 storied apartment house and on the 14th and 27th floors of the 36 storied apartment house where educators and their families can have a pleasant rest.
					
					 He visited the construction site in August last and instructed the builders to successfully complete the project by the anniversary of the Party so that the houses might be provided to teachers and researchers as gifts. He gave precious instructions concerning the work to wind up the construction.
					
					 He was satisfied to see the exterior of the apartment houses peculiarly decorated with color tiles and hard glass. He looked round several flats on the third floor of apartment house No. 2 to learn in detail about the construction.
					
					 Going round the living room, kitchen, study and bedroom one by one, he said they are properly fitted with furniture according to the design he had already ratified, the floors are covered with quality material and the colors and patterns of the wallpapers gave the feeling of comfort. 
					
					 He promised to provide every household with a TV set and more sets of varieties of tableware as he had said.
					
					 He told officials to fix a bookshelf to the wall of the study in front the table so that teachers and researchers may study and prepare their teaching plans in their houses without any inconvenience and a round mirror to the wall of the corridor to their convenience.
					
					  He went up to several floors one by one to learn in detail about the construction. He went round the indoor resting place on the 17th floor.
					
					 The indoor resting place has been successfully built so that teachers and researchers may have stroll, reading and amusement games and their children may play to their satisfaction, he said.
					
					 He went out to the veranda to enjoy a bird's-eye view of the cityscape. He was pleased that the apartment houses are located in a good place and their appearance made the Ryonghung Crossroads look nicer. 
					
					 He said there is nothing to spare for teachers and researchers of the university who train scientific talents who will be responsible for the future of the country in the age of knowledge-based economy, age of campaign of brains.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that educators of Kim Il Sung University would achieve bigger successes in the education of younger generation and training of talents true to the party's intention. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK; Ma Won Chun, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK; Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University; and Kim Thae Hi, chief secretary of the party committee of the university.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Sends Message of Sympathy to Pakistani PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Sends Message of Sympathy to Pakistani PM
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of sympathy to his Pakistani counterpart Mian Mohammad Nawaz Sharif on Friday in connection with the earthquake which hit Pakistan.
					 The message expressed hope that the living of the residents in the afflicted area would return to normal as soon as possible thanks to the positive efforts of the Pakistani government to eradicate the aftermath of the earthquake.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulates to FM of Cambodia
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Congratulates to FM of Cambodia
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Friday sent a congratulatory message to Hor Nam Hong upon his reappointment as deputy prime minister of the government and minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Cambodia.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger and wished him greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Censured for Brutal Killing of Inhabitant
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Censured for Brutal Killing of Inhabitant
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society issued a statement Saturday censuring the south Korean puppet regime for brutally killing its inhabitant when he tried to come over to the northern half of Korea by crossing the River Rimjin.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Having no desire to live and finding himself in despair, the inhabitant tried to come over to the northern half of Korea, longing for it, his last option.
					
					 This killing glaringly revealed the puppet group's unethical and cruel nature as it was a monstrous murder absolutely unimaginable in the light of human reason and common sense.
					
					 What is stunning is that not content with its shameless behavior to justify the crime, the group kicked off an anti-DPRK smear campaign after labeling the innocent inhabitant a "spy from the north."
					
					 This serious provocation against the DPRK goes to prove how desperately the puppet group is working to escalate the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is, indeed, a group of beasts in human skin without equals.
					
					 Such outrageous human rights abusers and beast-like gangsters are now vociferating about someone's "human rights" and "ethics." This is sheer sophism reminiscent of a thief crying "stop the thief!" and a height of shamelessness.
					
					 The puppet group should apologize to all Koreans and the international community for its brutal killing of the innocent man and severely punish those killers.
					
					 The statement called on Red Cross organizations and international bodies valuing justice and conscience and fair international public opinion not to tolerate the puppet group's unethical crimes but to turn out in actions to severely condemn and mete out a stern judgment to the criminals.

articles.title: Kim Chaek University of Technology Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
Kim Chaek University of Technology Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Kim Chaek University of Technology led by President Hong So Hon left here Saturday to take part in the forum of presidents and rectors of world universities to be held in Qingdao, China.

articles.title: Different Countries, Regions Delegations Leave
articles.content:
Different Countries, Regions Delegations Leave
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Delegations of different countries and regions left here by air and train Saturday after participating in the 9th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair.

articles.title: Greetings from Cyprian President
articles.content:
Greetings from Cyprian President
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Nicos Anastasiades, president of Cyprus, on Sept. 21.
					 The message extended sincerest and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the government and people of the Republic of Cyprus on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 It hoped that the bilateral relations would grow stronger in the mutual interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Greetings from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
articles.content:
Greetings from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on September 21.
					 The national leader said in the message that he is honored to extend warmest congratulations and fraternal salute to Kim Jong Un on behalf of all members of the party and its supporters and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 He said the Workers' Party of Mexico is firmly confident that the WPK, the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, is steadily glorifying their noble idea and immortal exploits performed in the party-building and dynamically developing the socialist cause under the wise Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He sincerely wished Kim Jong Un great success in his work to develop the WPK, build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 He extended highest regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Ukrainian Politician's Impressions of DPRK
articles.content:
Ukrainian Politician's Impressions of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Sergey Topalov, member of the Central Committee of the Ukrainian Communist Party and second secretary of the Crimean Republic Committee, gave his impressions of the DPRK in a press interview on Sept. 17 after visiting it to take part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 He said:
					
					 The Korean people's day of victory in the war is one of the significant national holidays.
					
					 The DPRK is on a high level of education in military affairs and patriotism.
					
					 The Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, a magnificent monumental edifice in the DPRK, contributes to educating the younger generation in patriotic tradition so that they may carry forward the soul of their grandfathers and fathers.
					
					 Accusing the U.S. and the Western media of conducting their stereotyped false propaganda about the DPRK, he went on:
					
					 The DPRK is making very successful progress.
					
					 During my stay there I witnessed once again the free education system, free medical care and other socialist welfare measures enforced in the DPRK.
					
					 A remarkable leap forward has been brought about in the efforts to improve the people's living standard in the DPRK in recent years under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the party and state.
					
					 The Western media's claim that the DPRK is a closed country is no more than a fiction cooked up and spread by them.
					
					 He introduced Pyongyang, the capital of the DPRK, as follows:
					
					 Pyongyang has wide and clean avenues with developed public transportation system such as metro, trolley bus, tramcar and bus services.
					
					 There are good cultural and amusement facilities including parks. Neither beggars nor paupers could be found there.
					
					 Pyongyang City is one of the most secure cities in the world.
					
					 We were deeply moved to see the Korean people's profound respect and reverence for their leader.
					
					 Society is stable without the rich and the poor. The people are fully confident of their future.
					
					 Watching the military parade celebrating the 60th anniversary of victory in the war, I came to have conviction of the invincible might of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The Western media are releasing misinformation about the DPRK because the U.S. sustained a shameful defeat in the last Korean War.
					
					By concluding the Armistice Agreement on July 27, 1953 the U.S. admitted its defeat in the Korean War. This was the first defeat of the U.S. in history.
					
					 The DPRK, not a big country, lives its own way and its people live well quite contrary to the terrible life described by the "highly civilized West".
					
					 Many cutting-edge projects were carried out or are now under way in the DPRK.
					
					 It is capable of implementing its plans for ultra modernization.
					
					 What is important is that no one should threaten DPRK or disturb its development and impose one's ideology on it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Working Way Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Did
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Working Way Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Did
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday editorially calls upon all party members, service personnel and people to single-mindedly unite around Marshal Kim Jong Un and work hard the way President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il did as befitting the descendants of Kim Il Sung and the soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il and thus build a thriving nation on this land without fail. 
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 Whoever lives and works in the new era of the Juche revolution led by Kim Jong Un should advance under the uplifted slogan "Let us work and live the way Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il did!"
					
					 This slogan reflects the goal of the life and struggle of the Juche-type revolutionaries and indicates the basic way for achieving eternal prosperity of the country. 
					
					 All service personnel and people of the DPRK are descendants, soldiers and disciples of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as they grew up, learning how to make a revolution and create everything under their care. For them to lead a rewarding and worthwhile life is to live and work the way Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il did because they acquired the Juche outlook on the revolution, outlook on life and moral outlook, enjoying a precious political integrity under their care. 
					
					 The way Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il did represents the steadfast Korean style, Juche style of solving all issues arising in the revolution and construction by enlisting their own strength and inexhaustible mental power of the popular masses in line with the requirements and interests of the Korean revolution and people. It reflects the fighting mettle to create everything from scratch, knowing nothing impossible and the revolutionary spirit of tiding over difficulties through a brave offensive. It also represents a go-ahead work style of ceaselessly aiming at and creating something new and a revolutionary work style of always foreseeing future, working out bold operations and bringing about dramatic changes. 
					
					 To live and work the way Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il did provides the WPK and the revolution with  a key to winning victory after victory and indicates a wide avenue for achieving prosperity.

articles.title: Papers Condemn Brutal Killing of S. Korean Civilian
articles.content:
Papers Condemn Brutal Killing of S. Korean Civilian 
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Saturday carry commentaries slamming the south Korean puppet authorities for killing a south Korean civilian when he tried to come over to the north by swimming across the River Rimjin recently. 
					 South Korean puppet army soldiers fired hundreds of bullets at a bare-handed civilian coming over to the north in pursuit of a way of living, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 What is more intolerable is that the authorities are spreading a ridiculous story about "a spy" when public became vocal condemning the atrocity. 
					
					 The Intelligence Service of south Korea is claiming that he was highly likely to be a spy of the north who attempted to go to the north. And the south Korean military is busy justifying the killing, asserting that soldiers are obliged to fire at anyone disobedient to control and that he might have gone over to the north in a moment, had he been allowed to do so. 
					
					 It is the sinister intention of the south Korean authorities to calm down the public denunciation of the brutal killing, use this accidental incident for stoking extreme hostility towards the north and kicking up a campaign of confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 The recent brutal killing of the civilian is nothing but the height of the crime against humanity and human rights, stunning the world people. 
					
					 This incident once again brought to light the true colors of the south Korean authorities as cruel human butchers who do not recognize the elementary rights of toiling masses but mercilessly kill them, utterly indifferent to human ethics. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that with no rhetoric can the south Korean authorities evade the responsibility for murdering the civilian and abusing the incident for escalating the inter-Korean confrontation.

articles.title: S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks Assailed
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Traitor Ryu Kil Jae, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, when interviewed by Chosun Ilbo shortly ago, said the reunions of separated families and their relatives can never be subject to any dealing or be a bargaining chip. He added it is most unpleasant to hear the north saying the progress in the north-south relations was a result of its good faith and magnanimity. He went the lengths of slandering the strategic line set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea and making such invectives that it is a way out for the north to make a switchover to the line of "no nukes and economic growth".
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Saturday terms his remarks senseless rubbish aimed to distort the truth of the situation and evade his responsibility.
					
					 What Ryu uttered only reveals his anti-reunification nature as he did nothing for the progress of the north-south ties but put a brake on the way of reunification. He, being devoid of elementary etiquette and with neither the will to improve the north-south ties nor ability to do so, acts surly and only speaks ill of the dialogue partner.
					
					 What is worst is that he dared find fault with the most just strategic line set forth by the WPK.
					
					 His remarks are an open denial of the dignity and social system of the DPRK and a revelation of his sinister intention to realize his ambition of "unification of social systems" by leading the north to "change".
					
					 The traitor's arrogant and confrontational remarks point to the south Korean puppet authorities' scheme to deteriorate the north-south ties, not to solve the present crisis.
					
					 With no sleight of hand can the puppet regime distort the truth and evade its responsibility for plunging the north-south ties into a deadlock.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime's "Theory of Principle"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime's "Theory of Principle"
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are abusing dialogue for confrontation with fellow countrymen, describing a series of achievements made in north-south dialogue recently as a fruition of their "theory of principle". Their moves are reaching the worst phase which should not be overlooked.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article Saturday.
					
					 It goes on: What merits a serious attention is that not only the authorities but conservative media and paid trumpeters styling themselves "experts" termed the atmosphere of inter-Korean reconciliation which swept Korea in the June 15 era of reunification "consequences of the period in which the south was pulled by the north". They are seriously misleading public opinion, crying out for "abiding by the principle". They are also blustering that "it is necessary to lead the north to changes" and "pull it", driving the situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 The puppet group is talking about "achievements", praising its "theory of principle", the one for confrontation, though it is harmful to national reconciliation, unity and reunification. This is nothing but a reckless act to cover up its heinous anti-reunification scenario and justify its anachronistic "policy toward the north" as it is an unpardonable mockery of public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 The "theory of principle" touted by the south Korean authorities is quite contrary to the north-south joint declarations and it is aimed to carry out the U.S. strategy against the DPRK.
					
					 It is, at the same time, a dangerous theory against peace and for a war against the north and a very poisonous theory fanning up distrust and antagonism in violation of the spirit of trust and unity enshrined in the joint declarations.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the puppet regime hide the confrontational nature of the "theory of principle." Its persistent insistence on it would only precipitate the total failure of its anti-reunification scenario to bring the inter-Korean relations to collapse in face of curse and condemnation of all Koreans.

articles.title: KCNA Accuses S. Korean Media of Inciting Confrontation
articles.content:
KCNA Accuses S. Korean Media of Inciting Confrontation
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Conservative media and riff-raffs styling themselves "experts on the north" in south Korea are malignantly slandering the just step taken by the DPRK.
					 They are trying to falsify truth, asserting "the north's postponement of the reunion of separated families is bedeviling the inter-Korean relations" and "the north has totally broken its promise with the south by taking issue with mere words uttered by a government official and media".
					
					 Such rhetoric is nothing but sophism intended to evade their responsibility for having thrown the slowly improving inter-Korean relations into the phase of confrontation.
					
					 As far as those conservative media and "experts on the north" are concerned, they are nothing but leftovers of the era which earned such ill-fame as waiting maids of power and paid trumpeters misleading public opinion. 
					
					 They are no more than a group of traitors as they took the lead in bedeviling the inter-Korean relations, far from contributing to their improvement.
					
					 As early as in the period when all Koreans were seething with the desire for reunification, those reptile media joined  the conservative group in slandering the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as "north's document for operation against the south" and "agreed promise which cannot but be dishonored ".
					
					 When the people of the DPRK were grieving over the greatest loss of the nation, they dared describe it as "forced and orchestrated sorrow."
					
					 Recently, they went the lengths of describing the compatriotic and humanitarian efforts made by the north with sincerity as "an offensive for tactical dialogue" while persisting in their wrongdoings to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 When a series of achievements were made in the north-south relations thanks to the efforts of the north, they hurled mud at their dialogue partner, trumpeting about "results of the south's confidence-building process."
					
					 As seen above, reptile media and paid trumpeters in south Korea have taken the lead in stirring up confrontation with compatriots and hostility toward them by running the whole gamut of lies and fabrications. 
					
					 Great irony is that they are letting loose a whole string of rhetoric in a bid to create such impression that they are concerned over the north-south relations and agreements.
					
					 The group of traitors, who consider it as a job to pursue confrontation with compatriots in breach of impartiality and conscience, is as bad as cancer and a source of trouble as they stand in the way of mending the inter-Korean relations and achieving national reunification.
					
					 All facts go to prove that it is impossible to remove distrust and atmosphere of hostility among Koreans unless the false propaganda of those reptile media and tricksters is brought to an end in south Korea.
					
					 Those confrontation maniacs should be eliminated for the reconciliation and unity of the nation, peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The bases of those die-hard trumpeters have already been placed within the range of strike of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind they will only invite a disaster for patronizing those agitating confrontation.

articles.title: KCNA Slams S. Korea for Instigating Defectors to Scatter Anti-DPRK Leaflets
articles.content:
KCNA Slams S. Korea for Instigating Defectors to Scatter Anti-DPRK Leaflets
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative regime again instigated wicked human scum to scatter copies of leaflets slandering the DPRK, enraging all Koreans.
					 Die-hard traitors to the nation including representative of the Federation of Movement for Freedom of North Pak Sang Hak, representative of Radio Free North Korea Kim Song Min and professor of Kyungmin University in Seoul Kang Myong Do flied copies of leaflets toward the DPRK from Kwanghwa County, Kyonggi Province on September 7, two days before the anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 They defected to the south, after being forsaken by the folks at home and their own kinsmen for committing unpardonable crimes such as murder, theft, embezzlement of state property and immoral conducts in the DPRK.
					
					 They are acting as a shock brigade in stirring up confrontation with the DPRK to prolong their dirty remaining days by begging for more pennies from the U.S. and the conservative regime.
					
					 We have already warned that the confrontational acts of the dirty human scum may lead the north-south relations to an unpredictable point of explosion.
					
					 However, they have kept on the sordid moves backed by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime which egged the human rejects on to escalate confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are pursuing confrontation policy toward the DPRK by relying on human scum, a disgusting act and a last-ditch effort of those taken aback by the might of the DPRK.
					
					 The situation shows that the present south Korean regime remains unchanged in its vicious scheme to insult and make showdown with the DPRK despite its call for "confidence".
					
					 The planned reunions of separated families and their relatives went bust, a result of the regime's vicious act of seriously hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK even with the use of human scum.
					
					 The regime will get nothing but derision and denunciation by the public for shielding defectors to the south and pursuing confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 We will never pardon insect-like human scum for their senseless act nor pardon the regime for masterminding the rash act and conniving at it.

articles.title: S. Korean Fighter Crashes
articles.content:
S. Korean Fighter Crashes
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- An F-5E belonging to the 18th combat flying corps under the south Korean puppet air force, Thursday plunged into a hillock in Jungphyong County, North Chungchong Province, during a flight drill for a war against the north, according to south Korean KBS.

articles.title: S. Korean Group Accused of Fascist Action against Pro-reunification Patriots
articles.content:
S. Korean Group Accused of Fascist Action against Pro-reunification Patriots
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean supreme court sentenced Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), to four years in jail on Thursday, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The south Korean puppet group committed such barbarism as hurling hooligans into forcibly taking him to prison as soon as he crossed the demarcation line in Panmunjom in July last year, incriminating his courageous visit to Pyongyang to pay condolences over the greatest loss of the nation on behalf of compatriots in the south.
					
					 The puppet group has inflicted all sorts of physical and mental pain upon him behind bars for nearly a year and 3 months since then. It sentenced him to a jail term at a series of trials on charges of violation of the "Security Law." 
					
					 At a hearing of final appeal held that day the supreme court upheld the sentence of 4 years in prison which had been imposed upon him at the first and second trials.
					
					 At the same time, it sentenced the secretary general of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon to 3 years in jail and 4 years of stay of execution on the groundless charge that he helped Ro in his visit to Pyongyang. 
					
					 Such fascist actions taken by the puppet group against the pro-reunification patriots despite the strong protest and denunciation of all compatriots are a revelation of its bitter enmity toward the DPRK and a blatant challenge to the nation aspiring after reunification.

articles.title: Protest Actions against Suppression of Teachers Union Declared
articles.content:
Protest Actions against Suppression of Teachers Union Declared
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea held a press conference on Sept. 24 at which it declared actions in protest against the unreasonable suppression of the union.
					 It accused the Ministry of Employment and Labor of threatening not to recognize the union unless it amends the present rules.
					
					 To put down the legitimacy of the union is intolerable as it is an act of trampling down the rights of the people, it said.
					
					 It termed such suppression a politically-motivated crackdown to disorganize pro-democracy figures.
					
					 On September 23 the Teachers Union held an emergency meeting at which it announced its action program.
					
					 It said that it would form a joint measure committee together with educational, civic, public and labor organizations and stage strong actions such as a joint press conference, publication of statements and declarations and candlelight rallies.

articles.title: Japanese Paper Accused of Hurting Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership
articles.content:
Japanese Paper Accused of Hurting Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan accused the Japanese Asahi Shimbun of releasing a conspiratorial article hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					 They visited the main office of the newspaper on Sept. 24 and chided it for letting a specified reporter conduct false propaganda about the DPRK so far and cooking up a baseless story in a bid to malignantly slander it.
					
					  They strongly demanded the newspaper make an apology for it and carry a correction.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Carried by Mexican Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Carried by Mexican Paper
 Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- The Mexican paper Unidad Nacional allotted a whole page to the main contents of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" on Sept. 15. The talk was published in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on the Day of Songun.
					 The paper carried a photo of leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un standing together.

articles.title: ACR condena crimen anti-DDHH de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
ACR condena crimen anti-DDHH de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 28 una declaracion denunciando el fusilamiento de un habitante surcoreano que intento pasar a la RPDC cruzando a nado el rio Rimjin.
					 El asesinado vivia desesperado sin poder ganarse la vida en la sociedad surcoreana y como ultima opcion, decidio pasar a la RPDC por la cual sentia simpatia, comienza la nota y continua:
					
					  Sin embargo, la camarilla titere surcoreana cometio ese asesinato inimaginable por un ser humano con sano juicio volviendo a demostrar su atributo antietico y barbaro.
					
					  Lo que causa mas consternacion es que en su intento de justificar el homicidio, ella tilda al muerto de "espia norcoreano" y trata de escenificar otra campana intrigante contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Esto deviene otro caso de grave provocacion contra la RPDC, el cual demuestra cuan freneticamente recurre la horda surcoreana a la campana de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  Esos sofocadores de DDHH y salvajes cuestionan cinicamente ahora la situacion de "DDHH" y la "etica" de alguien.
					
					  Ellos deben pedir disculpas a toda la nacion y la sociedad internacional por el asesinato injustificable y castigar severamente a los matones.
					
					  Llamamos a las entidades de cruz roja de varios paises del mundo, las organizaciones internacionales y la imparcial opinion publica internacional, que aprecian la justicia y la conciencia, a condenar y denunciar categoricamente la barbaridad antietica de los titeres surcoreanos y a sumarse a la lucha por sentenciar severamente a los criminales.

articles.title: RPDC vence por 18:0 a las Marianas del Norte
articles.content:
RPDC vence por 18:0 a las Marianas del Norte
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En el partido frente a las Marianas del Norte para ganar boletos al Campeonato Asiatico de Futbol sub-16 de 2014, efectuado el dia 27, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea vencio por 18:0 a su rival.
					El equipo coreano realizara el dia 29 la ultima justa con la escuadra china.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a trabajar y vivir por estilo de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a trabajar y vivir por estilo de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En el editorial divulgado este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun llama a todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y los habitantes a unirse compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y luchar por el estilo del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il como descendientes y discipulos de estos Generalisimos para levantar sin falta la mejor potencia del mundo sobre el territorio patrio. 
					Los que viven y luchan en la nueva era de la revolucion del Juche guiada por el Mariscal deben levantar en alto la consigna de "!Vivamos y trabajemos al estilo del Presidente y del Dirigente!", comienza el editorial y continua:
					
					Esta consigna refleja la meta de vida y lucha de los revolucionarios del tipo jucheano y el remedio principal para lograr la prosperidad eterna de la patria. 
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos son los descendientes del Presidente y soldados y discipulos del Dirigente. Bajo la guia de los Generalisimos, obtuvieron la valiosa vida politica, aprendieron la manera de hacer la revolucion y crear y asimilaron la concepcion de la revolucion, la vida y la moralidad del Juche. 
					
					Trabajar como el Presidente y el Dirigente significa resolver todos los problemas de la revolucion y la construccion conforme a las demandas e intereses de la revolucion y el pueblo movilizando la inagotable fuerza espiritual de las masas populares.
					
					En otra palabra, implica el temperamento revolucionario de superar las dificultades con impetu combativo y ofensiva audaz aspirando y creando siempre lo nuevo. 
					
					Cuando vivamos y luchemos por el estilo del Presidente y del Dirigente, triunfaran siempre  el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la revolucion coreana y se abrira la senda de prosperidad de la patria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia palabras de Ryu Kil Jae dichas en reciente entrevista
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia palabras de Ryu Kil Jae dichas en reciente entrevista
Pyongyang, 28 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En reciente entrevista con Chosun Ilbo, el ministro de Unificacion del Sur de Corea, Ryu Kil Jae, dijo que el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados no puede ser "tema de negocio o regateo".
					Ademas, califico de "expresion mas detestable" la opinion del Norte (de Corea) de que el avance de relaciones N-S se ha logrado gracias a la buena fe y magnanimidad de la RPDC. 
					
					Al criticar de una manera u otra hasta la linea estrategica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, disparateo que la unica salvacion del Norte es cambiar su linea por la "otra de desnuclearizacion y economia".
					
					Los chismes de Ryu se orientan a tergiversar la esencia de la situacion y evadir la culpabilidad, revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este sabado y continua: 
					
					El traidor Ryu calumnia a la contraparte de dialogo porque no tiene la cortesia ni la voluntad ni capacidad de mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur. 
					
					En particular, su censura sobre la justa linea estrategica del PTC significa la abierta negativa a la dignidad y regimen de la RPDC y una expresion de su malsano intento de lograr la "reunificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" al inducir al "cambio" a la RPDC.
					
					Sus dichos conflictivos dejan conocer que las autoridades titeres surcoreanos tratan de empeorar la actual crisis de relaciones N-S.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no podran tergiversar la esencia de la situacion creada ni eludir la responsabilidad de su crimen.
